Name: Scatteria - Post-apocalyptic shooter
About the game: Scatteria is a 2D Platformer shooter with a big selection of different firearms and explosives. Many different post-apocalypse levels to choose to fight your battles against your friends. Everything is destroyable with explosives. Scatteria has support for couch gaming with split screen mode. Also you can play against your friends in online mode or against waves of A.I in single player mode. Take cover in bunkers, basements, destroyed ruins, foxholes or behind sandbags. Destroy the environment with explosives to make your enemies time harder! Or just explode them into smaller pieces. Key features Fluid 2d platformer controls Two players on keyboard Or up to 4 with Controllers (Xbox + Playstation style controllers for Pc supported) Local Split screen up to 4 players Lots of weapons to choose from: Including Pistol, Rifle, Submachine Gun, Shotgun, Grenade Launcher, Bazooka, Assault Rifle Destroyable environments! Nearly everything can be destroyed And cool explosives What are you waiting for? The apocalypse is waiting for you!
